model
Interface ModelContext

All Known Subinterfaces:
Algebraic, Analytical, Branching, Discrete, Evaluation, Geometric, Numerical, PriorityQueue
All Known Implementing Classes:
AbstractAlgebraic, AbstractDiscrete, AbstractNumerical, CCAModelContext, FemoopAlgebraic, FemoopDiscrete, FemoopNumerical, TreeMapPriorityQueue
public interface ModelContext

All Forr� models implement this interface. A model is defined by its input parameters, a solve method and a number of external views. This interface provides methods for setting the input parameters, solving the model and getting external views.

The methods of every implementation of this interface should return either Serializable or Datatype objects. In the former case, remote invocation returns its result by value. Otherwise, the result is returned by (remote) reference.

Author:
Ricardo Corr�a (correa@lia.ufc.br)

Method Detail

putUsesPort

boolean putUsesPort(java.lang.String usesPortName,
                    EnumPort usesPort)
Binds an internal uses port, specified by its name, to a provides port of another model represented by a specified uses port object. This specified uses port object should be created by the model driver of this component as a result of a request originated at the session handler. This method is used by the model driver's implementation of its bindPorts method.

Parameters:
usesPortName - internal uses port's name
usesPort - a uses port object representing a provides port of another model
Returns:
TODO
Since:
April 02, 2005
See Also:
ModelDriver

getProvidesPort

EnumPort getProvidesPort(java.lang.String providesPortName,
                         BindingProperties bindingProp)
Gets a view of the model according to a specified view name. The port returned depends on the startNew method of the specified binding properties.

Parameters:
providesPortName - the view name
bindingProp - the binding properties
Returns:
a port providing the requested view.
